overall_score_explanation: This bike offers an excellent balance of comfort and performance, making it ideal for long-distance rides and varied terrain.
performance_score_explanation: The Domane SL 7 excels in performance with its lightweight carbon frame and responsive handling, though it's optimized for endurance rather than pure speed.
value_score_explanation: Exceptional value for the price point, offering carbon construction and 105 groupset typically found on more expensive bikes.
fit_score_explanation: The IsoSpeed decoupler provides excellent fit flexibility across different rider types, with adjustable geometry for various riding styles.
general_score_explanation: A well-rounded bike that performs admirably across multiple disciplines while maintaining a focus on rider comfort.
climbing_efficiency_explanation: The lightweight carbon frame and efficient power transfer make climbing enjoyable, though not as aggressive as pure race bikes.
aerodynamics_explanation: While not as aero-focused as dedicated race bikes, the frame design incorporates wind-cheating features that reduce drag on flat sections.
riding_position_explanation: The relaxed geometry provides an upright position that reduces fatigue on long rides while still allowing for efficient power transfer.
handling_explanation: Stable and predictable handling inspires confidence on descents and technical sections, with responsive steering when needed.
fit_flexibility_explanation: Multiple frame sizes and adjustable components allow riders of various heights and proportions to achieve an optimal fit.
ride_comfort_explanation: The IsoSpeed technology and carbon layup are specifically designed to absorb road vibrations, resulting in all-day comfort.
build_quality_explanation: Premium carbon construction with quality components throughout, built to withstand years of hard riding.
value_for_money_explanation: The combination of carbon frame, quality components, and innovative comfort technology delivers exceptional value at this price point.
surface_range_explanation: Versatile tire clearance and stable geometry make this bike capable on everything from smooth tarmac to gravel roads.

overall_score_explanation: A race-oriented bike that prioritizes speed and efficiency, perfect for competitive riders and those who value performance above all else.
performance_score_explanation: Built for racing, this bike delivers exceptional climbing ability and sprint acceleration thanks to its stiff, lightweight frame.
value_score_explanation: Solid value proposition with Ultegra groupset and full carbon construction at a competitive price point.
fit_score_explanation: The aggressive race geometry may not suit all riders, best for those with flexibility and racing aspirations.
general_score_explanation: This is a focused race machine that excels in its intended purpose but may sacrifice some comfort for performance.
climbing_efficiency_explanation: The stiff carbon frame and low weight make this an excellent climber that responds instantly to pedaling input.
aerodynamics_explanation: Wind tunnel-tested frame shapes and integrated cable routing minimize drag, making this one of the faster bikes in its class.
riding_position_explanation: Aggressive geometry puts riders in an aerodynamic position optimized for power output rather than comfort.
handling_explanation: Sharp, responsive handling allows for quick direction changes and confident cornering at high speeds.
fit_flexibility_explanation: Limited adjustment options mean proper sizing is critical; best suited for riders comfortable in aggressive positions.
ride_comfort_explanation: Firm ride quality prioritizes power transfer over vibration damping, which some riders may find harsh on rough roads.
build_quality_explanation: Quality carbon layup and proven reliability make this a durable race machine.
value_for_money_explanation: Strong value in the race bike category, offering performance that rivals bikes costing significantly more.
surface_range_explanation: Optimized for smooth pavement and racing; not designed for rough roads or gravel.
